subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tracy McGrady had 31 points and 9 assists and Rafer Alston added a season-high 24 points, helping the Houston Rockets push their franchise-best winning streak to 17 games with a 113-98 victory over the host Dallas Mavericks on Thursday night.
snippet: Tracy McGrady had 31 points and 9 assists and Rafer Alston added a season-high 24 points, helping the Houston Rockets push their franchise-best winning streak to 17 games with a 113-98 victory over the host Dallas Mavericks on Thursday night.
